Package info.ryandorman.simplescheduler.controller

Class AppointmentsViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.ryandorman.simplescheduler.controller.AppointmentsViewController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class AppointmentsViewController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Handles the logic associated with display a table of all Appointments and provides options to filter, create, update or delete Appointments.

      • loadAppointmentView

        private void loadAppointmentView​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent,
                                 java.lang.String title,
                                 int selectAppointmentId)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Load the Appointment modal and set it up for either creating or updating a Appointment.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - Event triggered by Create or Update buttons
        title - Title of the modal
        selectAppointmentId - Valid identifier for the Appointment to be updated; If not valid modal will be for creation.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - The javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader cannot load AppointmentView.fxml.
